Functions

Yields.ytm — Method.
ytm(price,cf,m,dc)
    price: scalar 
    cf: K vector of cash flows
    m:  K vector of times for the cash flows
    dc: type of composition: Discrete/Continuous

Computes the Yield-to-Maturity of a bond.

The ytm is computed as:

\[ytm = y: \text{such that price} = \sum_{i=1}^k \frac{cf_i}{(1+y)^{m_i}} ytm = y: \text{such that price} = \sum_{i=1}^k cf_i*\exp{-y*m_i}} \]

  • Yields.ytm
